content: I'm so glad you provided all these options. I think the sheet pan recipes will be perfect for me right now. I've been feeling really weak lately, still recovering from my surgery and all. It's been a tough few months - I was hospitalized for pneumonia back in March, and then had to deal with this knee issue. But I'm hoping to get back to my normal self soon. Do you have any tips on meal planning and grocery shopping when you have limited mobility?
